summary: Both REQ-13 and REQ-14 appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-13 is addressed by fixing the backend registerUser function, updating useQueries.ts with a useRegisterUser mutation that calls actor.registerUser(displayName), and updating SetupPage.tsx to use useRegisterUser instead of useSaveCallerUserProfile. REQ-14 is addressed in ChatHeader.tsx by reading the principal from useInternetIdentity and displaying it in a styled monospace block with copy-to-clipboard functionality inside the dropdown menu.

hallucinated_features.description: Copy-to-clipboard button with checkmark confirmation for the principal ID in ChatHeader
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked to display the principal ID (truncated or full). A copy-to-clipboard button with clipboard API integration and visual feedback (Check icon, 2-second timeout) was not requested.
